dimension: H.1-3/4 x W.9 x Dia.9 in.
title: Soup plate
description: Bowl, ceramic, border of twisted ribbons and floral garlands in gold and purple with central reserve ofa hunter and his dog conversing with a seated lady, Chinese Export XVIIIc cat. card dims H 1-3/4\' diam 8-7/8\'; listed as \'soup plate\' on cat. cards
